mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content (project_no, ctgr, url, memo, trans_url) VALUES (#{projectNo}, "website", #{url}, #{memo}, #{transUrl})

mapper.select: SELECT trans_url, COUNT(*) AS count, des FROM content WHERE NOT trans_url IS NULL GROUP BY trans_url ORDER BY count DESC, no DESC LIMIT 10;
